turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's order from bella luna's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one with pepperoni, one with extra cheese, and one buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately, bella luna's does not have buffalo chicken at this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to select another type of pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, let me get a meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: to confirm, you want 3 large pizzas, 1 with pepperoni, 1 with extra cheese, and 1 with meat lovers. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $56.29 will be your total. would you like to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've made the purchase to your account. the pizzas will be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. take care.
